nodes.bodyText: Can we add this response time graph before the time to first byte graph? You can just move this line up before the for loop, since it will add it to the list first.
this may need to catch additional ones like: https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/stress/shell/src/main/java/alluxio/stress/cli/StressMasterBench.java#L243
you may have to do do the special casting like here: https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/blob/master/stress/shell/src/main/java/alluxio/stress/cli/StressMasterBench.java#L250
I am not sure I can reuse the code since I added the filter to type and method  name in this method.
You don't really need to have the filter here because you can filter later in the GraphGenerator in ClientIO.
Since this is now in base parameters, this block can be moved to Benchmark, right?
Since this is now in base parameters, this block can be moved to Benchmark, right?
Why isn't this class just using a Histogram? That is a useful library to handle all the times.

I think we should ignore his max response time array (and maybe add a TODO to represent it correctly), or implement it correctly. The original purpose of it was to collect the max response time over time of the test, so if the array had 20 entries, the 1st entry would be the max response time of the first 1/20th of the run, the 2nd entry is the max response time for the 2nd 1/20th of the run, and so on.
I don't think this is collecting the max this way.
I changed to the right implementation of max time to first byte array.
